name: zenodo-cli
description: A commandline tool to interact with the Zenodo API. Developed by [@bjohas](https://github.com/bjohas) and [@a1diablo](https://github.com/a1diablo).

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch; npm publish; git push --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor; npm publish; git push --tags
scripts.publish:major: npm version major; npm publish; git push --tags

author: Björn Haßler
